name: this game made
description:
i had to lower the scope of my game from the next final fantasy to the kind of stuff that makes rpgmaker look bad because my uninspired and unmotivated A-- didn't wanna make anything reasonably good, and that didnt make it fun to make at all

so after a week or so i wanted an excuse to stop making it so i just finished the rest in a hour or two (ik thats why over half of it sucks)
